title: India: 'Cryptocurrency regulation' regulation bill could be tabled soon | WION | World English News
content:
1. India: 'Cryptocurrency regulation' regulation bill could be tabled soon | WION | World English News  WION
  2. Bitcoin trades at over 3% discount in India  The Block Crypto
  3. Indian Government Submits Bill to Ban Most Cryptocurrencies, Dashing Hopes for Friendlier Measure  Coindesk
  4. Gravitas: India could ban all private cryptocurrencies soon | Cryptocurrency Bill to be tabled soon?  WION
  5. India seeks to block most cryptocurrencies in new bill, government says  Reuters India
